text: Ascoli Calcio 1898, more simply known as just Ascoli, is an Italian professional football club from Ascoli Piceno, Marche. The club was founded in 1898 and currently plays in Serie B. ==Name changes== *1898–1905: Candido Augusto Vecchi *1905–1921: Ascoli Vigor *1921–1945: US Ascolana *1945–1955: AS Ascoli *1955–1971: Del Duca Ascoli *1971–Present: Ascoli Calcio 1898 == Titles == * Serie B ** Winners (2): 1977–78, 1985–86 * Serie C/Lega Pro ** Winners (2): 1971–72, 2014–15 == References == Category:Italian football clubs Category:1898 establishments in Italy Category:Province of Ascoli Piceno
title: Ascoli Calcio 1898
